title: I don't understand why i got banned.
body: I wasn't toxic in game. like i dont even chat in the game. The last game i played on my account was 5 days ago. Yesterday i signed on to gift my friend something because i owed him money. i gifted him 4 mystery champions. One day later i get my account perma banned. And i didnt even get an email. I swear riot just bans people that buy Rp so they will make another account and try to spend more money. I know im not the only one considering quitting this game because of this terrible player behavior system. i know i got reported because my friends that i que with did report me in game because they think its funny. But that was 5 days ago and i was using the account yesterday. The ban would of been minutes after the game ended. I just dont get what i did wrong and now i can never get my account back because in the terms and conditions it says under no circumstances will they give an account back. Riot games is starting to turn into a bunch of crooks.

> so you are telling me that i cannot log into my friends account and play a couple games of league without getting the account banned? This is a video game right?

It states right in the [Terms of Use](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse#your-account) that account sharing is not allowed: 

>**1.4. Can I share or sell my account or login credentials? (No.)**
When you create an account with us, we require you to select a unique username and password (collectively, your **“Login Credentials”**), which you’ll use each time you access the Game. You can’t share your account or Login Credentials with anyone. You can’t sell, transfer or allow any other person to access your account or Login Credentials, or offer to do so. You’re entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Login Credentials. Please notify us immediately if you become aware of any breach of security, including any loss, theft or unauthorized disclosure of your Login Credentials.

And it's not just League that has this rule: countless other games have it too, and for good reason, as it's to help protect you from having things done to your account that you would have never done to it otherwise. If you and your friend want to play together then just make your own separate accounts and do it that way.

maybe if your game didnt have so many fucking levels

people wouldnt be buying accounts after getting banned

First off, if someone got banned why would they spend money on another account when they know that their behavior got them banned before?

Second, does it show chat logs when you try to sign in? It sounds like you got manually reviewed by someone, but it could be due to an account compromise. I would suggest openning a support ticket asking why you were banned.

No it did not show chat logs. it doesnt let me sign in. it just says "this account got permanently banned. please check your email for further information." i check my email and nothing shows up. i just made a ticket. I am pissed because regardless of their BS reasoning i will not get my account back.
You are overly pessimistic towards Riot.

It's possible that something happened when you bought the RP.

Sometimes the transaction will "fail", even though you got the rp. When that happens, they lock the account, which is **not a perma ban.** A lock is done for transaction issues and compromised accounts to prevent anymore problems or damage until everything is sorted out.

I'd like to note, though, that they may not respond until Monday or Tuesday due to it being the weekend. You'll unfortunately have to be patient.
But it says it's permanently banned. It didn't say locked or anything.
what did it say the reason was and if it did say toxic show us the chat logs you

> [{quoted}](name=Smouxihr,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F2ynV7ec,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-07-22T05:31:09.155+0000)I swear riot just bans people that buy Rp so they will make another account and try to spend more money.

This is a common myth, but it is *definitely* a myth. Keeping long-time players happy and providing them with more content they'd enjoy is a better way to retain purchasing customers than banning them and hoping they re-buy content.

It sounds like there might be an error with your credit card or the transaction in question -- financial situations like that do earn an account *lock*, but it can usually be resolved by sending in a ticket to Riot Support, who will help you fix the problem.

Best of luck!

This sounds like there was an error with your buy of RP, if you really were not toxic then this will be most likely the reason for your ban. Just contact the support, they will tell you to pay back your debt and unban your account. Transaction problems is one of the few things where Riot actually unbans people, so dw you will get it back
